title: # 524 - Ron Funches & ME
itunes:title: # 524 - Ron Funches & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian/actor, Ron Funches. We talk about losing 150 lbs, how he took control of his life, being undeniable, getting sick on his honey moon, and much more!  

 

Follow Ron

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ronfunch 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/RonFunches 

 

This episode is brought to you by Wine Enthusiast. Go to http://www.wineenthusiast.com or text “BERT” to 511511 for the 4th of July Wine Cellar & Furniture sale.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Helix. Get up to $200 off all mattress orders and 2 free pillows at http://www.helixsleep.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Shady Rays. Use the code “BERT” for 50% off 2+ pairs of polarized sunglasses at http://www.shadyrays.com 

 

This episode is also brought to you by NextEvo. Get 25% off your first order of $40 or more with the promo code “BERT” at http://www.nextevo.com 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Freeze Pipe. Get 10% off with the code “BERT” at http://www.thefreezepipe.com 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer
